article: a lengthy prison sentence for a rights activist shows the determination of chinese officials to suppress any vestige of dissent related to shoddy construction and unnecessary deaths in last year 's devastating earthquake in sichuan province , fellow activists said .
abstract: school construction critic gets prison term in china li bibo and zhang jing contributed research
